parameters.name: EnsRegionId
parameters.description: The ID of the edge node.

parameters.name: NetworkId
parameters.description: The ID of the VPC to which the vSwitches belong.

parameters.name: OrderByParams
parameters.description:
The order in which you want to sort the returned data. Example: {"EnsRegionId":"desc"}.

By default, the nodes are sorted by IDs in descending order.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The page number of the returned page. Default value: **1**.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page. Valid values: **1 to 50**. Default value: **10**.
